import { Button } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import { leave, accessParticipants} from './Zoom' import { meetingStarted as ms } from '../data/meetingStarted' import {liveParticipants} from '../data/liveParticipants' import { useRecoilState } from 'recoil' import { useEffect } from 'react'; export const Head = () => { const [meetingStarted, setMeetingStarted] = useRecoilState(ms) const [, setLiveP] = useRecoilState(liveParticipants); const zoomMeeting = document.getElementById("zmmtg-root") const turnItOff = (e) => { e.preventDefault() zoomMeeting.style.display = 'none' zoomMeeting.style.height = '0px' zoomMeeting.style.width = '0px' zoomMeeting.style.position = 'relative' zoomMeeting.style.backgroundColor = 'black' zoomMeeting.style.zIndex = '1' } const turnItOn = (e) => { e.preventDefault() zoomMeeting.style.marginTop = '50px' zoomMeeting.style.display = 'flex' zoomMeeting.style.height = '90%' zoomMeeting.style.width = '100%' zoomMeeting.style.position = 'fixed' zoomMeeting.style.zIndex = '1' zoomMeeting.style.backgroundColor = 'black' const meetingClient = document.getElementsByClassName("meeting-client") const meetingInnerClient = document.getElementsByClassName("meeting-client-inner") meetingClient.style.marginTop = '50px' meetingClient.style.display = 'flex' meetingClient.style.height = '90%' meetingClient.style.width = '100%' meetingClient.style.position = 'fixed' meetingClient.style.zIndex = '1' meetingClient.style.backgroundColor = 'black' meetingInnerClient.style.marginTop = '50px' meetingInnerClient.style.display = 'flex' meetingInnerClient.style.height = '90%' meetingInnerClient.style.width = '100%' meetingInnerClient.style.position = 'fixed' meetingInnerClient.style.zIndex = '1' meetingInnerClient.style.backgroundColor = 'black' } return (

Zoom App

); };
